dmca.title: Morritt's Claims Denied
dmca.body:
I am writing in reference to your letter of May 16th, 2003 regarding alleged Trademark and Name Violations.

It is fairly obvious upon receipt of this letter that your clients Morritt Properties Cayman Ltd., have not fully disclosed to you all pertinent history and details of morrittsgrand.com, the domain name and website in question, nor of the relationship between Morritt Property Cayman Ltd. and myself.  I believe that this letter will put to rest the accusations made in your letter, and clarify some of the statements made therein in order to dispel any confusion regarding my legitimate interest in the URL morrittsgrand.com and the use of the terms
